==Introduction==
The `ASF` class is a partial implementation of the Advanced Systems Format (ASF) standard. ASF is a file format that can contain various types of information ranging from audio (Windows Media Audio, WMA) and video (Windows Media Video, WMV) to script commands and developer defined custom streams. The `ASF` class is capable of reading the file information headers.

==Examples==

===Example #1: How to read ASF information===

{{{
<?php
require_once("ASF.php");

$asf = new ASF("file.(asf|wma|wmv)");
if ($obj = $asf->nextObject()) {                      // get the header object
  while ($obj->hasChildObjects()) {
    $child = $obj->nextChildObject();
    if ($child instanceof ASF_ContentDescriptionObject) {
      $val = $child->getTitle();                      // or getAuthor, getDescription, ...
    }
    if ($child instanceof ASF_ExtendedContentDescriptionObject) {
      $val = $child->getDescriptor("WM/AlbumTitle");  // or WM/Genre, WM/Year, ...
    }
    if ($child instanceof ASF_FilePropertiesObject) {
      $val = $child->getFileSize();                   // or getPlayDuration, ...
    }
  }
}
}}}
